questions.questionText: What are the two types of gas prices that make up IOTA gas fees?
What is the purpose of the tallying rule in the IOTA gas pricing mechanism?

answerOptions.answerText: To survey validators for their gas prices.
To incentivize validators to honor the reference gas price.
To set the storage price across the network.
To increase the gas price during congestion.

questions.questionText: How does the IOTA gas pricing mechanism ensure low, predictable fees?

answerOptions.answerText: By allowing users to submit arbitrary gas prices.
By setting a fixed gas price per transaction.
By surveying validators and encouraging healthy competition through incentives.
By removing tips from transaction pricing.
